text:
*<!here>* - Reaching out to you just in case you are interested to add your thoughts and experiences on the Collaborative blog post that we started writing during session 03 of the Collaboration Campfires. :pencil:

You are welcome to contribute to this blog post even if you were unable to attend the session 03 of the Campfires! :sunflower:

Please feel free to add your thoughts to this <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1gAt_nyc5M6mZzNiAYeR1nnUvUj3gMXgKmcMveZ2iTck/edit#|collaborative draft blog> by May 24, 2022. Please add your findings/comments/thoughts as 'Suggestions' to the google doc. We plan to publish this blog post soon!

Also, we would like to encourage you to attend session 04 "How to Contribute to a Translation Team" of the Campfires. This session is scheduled on May 24, 15:30 - 17:00 hours UTC. (<https://us02web.zoom.us/meeting/register/tZ0qf-uqqjovE9RqD6hvjAIigS9nQb69WGRf|Registration is free and open to all>).
